message: Disabled artifact caching (not needed for our use cases) and improved shutdown handling.

added: if (errOutput.contains("Can't connect to MySQL server on")) {
logger.warn("mysql was already shutdown - no need to add extra shutdown hook - process does it out of the box.");
logger.error("mysql shutdown failed with error code: " + p.waitFor() + " and message: " + CharStreams.toString(stdErr));
deleted: logger.error("mysql shutdown failed with error code: " + p.waitFor() + " and message: " + CharStreams.toString(stdErr));
